sourcesContent:
import * as React from "react" import * as Svg from "../Svg" import * as Db from "../data/Database" class RoomCard extends React.Component{ data = undefined render() { this.data = Db.room_details[this.props.room] data["hotel"] = this.props.room return (
{this.data.hotel} {this.data.price}
{this.data.room}
{this.data.description}
{this.data.bed_svg ? Svg.bed(this.props.isLiked) : null} {this.data.bath_svg ? Svg.bath(this.props.isLiked) : null} {this.data.couch_svg ? Svg.couch(this.props.isLiked) : null} {this.data.tv_svg ? Svg.tv(this.props.isLiked) : null} {this.data.wine_svg ? Svg.wine(this.props.isLiked) : null}
{Svg.star(!this.props.isLiked)}
) } } export default RoomCard
